store_info.description_short: Etherpad is an open source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
description_long: No more sending your stuff back and forth via email, just set up a pad, share the link and start collaborating!

Etherpad allows you to edit documents collaboratively in real-time, much like a live multi-player editor that runs in your browser. Write articles, press releases, to-do lists, etc. together with your friends, fellow students or colleagues, all working on the same document at the same time.
store_info.hint: All documents are public, so you should chose hard-to-guess names for sensitive docs.
